description: Add some zest to your plate with this easy lemon chicken recipe. It’s all baked in one tray, making it easy to eat and easy to clean up.
name: Easy Lemon Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Combine garlic, ginger, honey, soy sauce, sweet chilli, lemon zest and juice and turmeric in a bowl. Add chicken, tossing to coat, then refrigerate to marinate for at least 20 minutes.
Place chicken in a 26 x 20cm 1.5L capacity baking dish and roast for 50 minutes, basting chicken with pan juices and adding lemon slices at 25 minutes, or until golden and chicken is tender.
Scatter over spring onion and sesame seeds, and serve.
